name: ashborn-circuits
description: ZK circuits for Ashborn privacy protocol

scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:transfer && npm run compile:shield && npm run compile:range
scripts.setup:transfer: snarkjs groth16 setup build/transfer.r1cs pot20_final.ptau build/transfer_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:shield: snarkjs groth16 setup build/shield.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/shield_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:range: snarkjs groth16 setup build/range.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/range_0000.zkey
scripts.export:vkeys: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/transfer_0000.zkey build/transfer_vkey.json && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/shield_0000.zkey build/shield_vkey.json && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/range_0000.zkey build/range_vkey.json
scripts.export:solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/transfer_0000.zkey build/TransferVerifier.sol
